content.query:
--  1. DeltaDropTarget
if object_id('DeltaDropTarget') is not null drop proc DeltaDropTarget
go 
create proc DeltaDropTarget
as 
    if object_id('target') is not null
    begin
        drop table target
    end 
go

-- 2. DeltaDropLastChanges
if object_id('DeltaDropLastChanges') is not null drop proc DeltaDropLastChanges
go 
create proc DeltaDropLastChanges
as 
    if object_id('LastChanges') is not null
    begin
        drop table LastChanges
    end 
go

--3. ShakeNBake
if object_id('ShakeNBake') is not null drop proc ShakeNBake
go 
create proc ShakeNBake
as 
    --ctas to merge
    if object_id('target2hash') is not null drop table [target2hash];
    create table [target2hash]
    with (
        distribution = hash([key]),
        clustered columnstore index
    )
    as
    select * from [target]

go
